Package ApproxsimClient.communication

Interface Summary
ApproxsimMessageListener This interface should be implemented by objects that are interested in receiving notifications about what happens with a ApproxsimMessage.
 

Class Summary
ConnectMessage Class representing the connect message.
DefaultApproxsimMessageListener This class provides a default implementation of the ApproxsimMessageListener interface.
DisconnectMessage Class representing the disconnect message.
GetGridMessage Class representing the GetGridMessage.
GridData A storage class for data about the grid.
InitializationMessage Class representing the initialization message.
LayerData A class that represents a layer of data for a certain number of cells in the grid.
LayerSubscription This class represents a subsctiption to a Layer.
PriorityQueue A thread safe priority queue with both blocking and non-blocking dequeue.
RegionData Class used when subscribing to aggregated pv values over a Region.
RegionSubscription This class represents a subscription to the aggregate of the process variables for a specified region.
RegisterForUpdatesMessage Class representing the RegisterForUpdates message.
ResetMessage Class representing the reset message.
ServerCapabilitiesMessage Class representing the server capabilities message.
ServerConnection Class representing a connection to a approxsim server.
SetPropertyMessage Class representing the SetPropertyMessage.
StepMessage Class representing the step message.
ApproxsimMessage Abstract class that is the super class of all messages to be sent between the vlient and the server.
ApproxsimMessageEvent This class represents the events that may be sent by a ApproxsimMessage to indicate the progress of the message.
ApproxsimObjectSubscription This class represents the type of subscription that should be used in order to obtain updates of a ApproxsimObject from the server.
ApproxsimSocket Wrapper around Socket class that may send and receive approxsim messages.
Subscription Abstract class that is the base class of all types of subscriptions.
SubscriptionCounter This class is used to monitor the intensity of the communication between the client and the server.
SubscriptionHandler This class handles subscriptions created by differentother objets.
SubscriptionMessage This class represents the subscription message.
TSQueue A thread safe queue with both blocking and non-blocking dequeue.
Unsubscription Class representing an unsubscription to an issued subscription.
Update Class for grouping an update with its type.
UpdateMessage This class represents an update message.
XMLHandler This is the class where all XML from the server is parsed and distributed to its proper place.
XMLHelper Abstract class that contains some convenience methods for handling xml creation.
 

Exception Summary
ServerException An object representing any error in a client-server exchange
